class UNET_UNIT[source]

UNET_UNIT(data:DataBunch, generator:Module, critic:Module, gen_loss_func:Callable[Tensor, Tensor, OneEltTensor], crit_loss_func:Callable[Tensor, Tensor, OneEltTensor], n_crit=None, n_gen=None, switcher:Callback=None, gen_first:bool=False, switch_eval:bool=True, show_img:bool=True, clip:float=None, **learn_kwargs) :: Learner

A Learner suitable for GANs.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GANModule[source]

GANModule(generator:Module=None, critic:Module=None, gen_mode:bool=True) :: Module

Wrapper around a generator and a critic to create a GAN.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GANLoss[source]

GANLoss(loss_funcG:Callable, loss_funcC:Callable, gan_model:GANModule) :: GANModule

Wrapper around loss_funcC (for the critic) and loss_funcG (for the generator).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GANTrainer[source]

GANTrainer(learn:Learner, switch_eval:bool=False, clip:float=None, beta:float=0.98, gen_first:bool=False, show_img:bool=True) :: LearnerCallback

Handles GAN Training.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class FixedGANSwitcher[source]

FixedGANSwitcher(learn:Learner, n_crit=5, n_gen=1) :: LearnerCallback

Switcher to do n_crit iterations of the critic then n_gen iterations of the generator.

{% endraw %}
